Functions

 EVALUATE (safcond__c)

 Conductor Function safcond__residual(c, p1, p2, k).

Detailed Description

Numerically robust generic conductance relation.

Enforces the product of difference relationship that occurs in heat conduction and elsewhere.

Note:
Used variously whenever quantity is proportional to the difference between two other quantities, such as heat transfer.

Function Documentation

EVALUATE ( safcond__residual   ) 

Conductor Function safcond__residual(c, p1, p2, k).

k = c/(p1 - p2) p1 = c/k + p2 p2 = -c/k + p1

EVALUATE ( safcond__c   ) 

Conductor Function safcond__q(p1, p2, k).

c = k * (p1 - p2)
